ygData.subject: Re: magic hammer
ygData.msgSnippet: It is conjuration for hammer of wrath, actually there are several hammers, first is wrath, second one is striking and third is requitial from what i have seen
ygData.messageBody:
It is conjuration for hammer of wrath, actually there are several hammers,
first is wrath, second one is striking and third is requitial from what i
have seen clerics get striking around 20 or close maybe late teens I forget
to relate that to paladins a lot of things clerics get we get like +10 lvls
later hehe, I can only assume later hammers are better delay attack power,
maybe even be able to give to party members but that is speculation I haven't
spoken to any clerics about this.

Shakel Almeth
Paladin of 13th order
Terrew Marr
